channel.title: Blogs on Arcturus Industries
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Arcturus Industries

item.title: Deep Inertial Prediction Challenge
item.description: The Deep Inertial Prediction (DIPr) challenge is a competition focused on improving short lasting IMU fallback tracking for VR systems.

item.title: Welcome to Arcturus
item.description: Welcome to Arcturus Industries. Here on our blog, we will share more on our team, our tech, what we are currently building, and opportunities to join us.

item.title: Announcing Room View 3D
item.description: Today we’re excited to announce that we’re working with Valve Software (creators of Half Life, Steam, and the Index HMD).
Once you are wearing the headset, your head motion is tracked and the virtual world is reprojected onto the headset display.
